messages: I love you more than words can express.
You taught me a lot, and I still learn from you!
One day, you will become the greatest artist in the world
Keep doing your art because every piece of art you make is beautiful
I want to be with you forever, and I am fixing!
I want to see our kids next year!
I love you, I want you, and I need you!
I want to be the best version of myself
Tell me how to take care of our kids
